Package org.codehaus.xfire.plexus

Class Summary
PlexusXFire An instance of XFire that is managed by Plexus.
PlexusXFireComponent Basic support methods for plexus XFire components.
PlexusXFireServlet An XFire servlet which obtains its XFire instance from Plexus.
PlexusXFireTest Contains helpful methods to test SOAP services.
ServiceLocatorFactory This is a simple adapter from plexus service locator to Factory
